Hi All,

I'm trying to think of a good way to test some Java apps. that are=

launched by WebStart.  I've setup some basic tests with HTTPUnit
that go t=
o the launch page, follow each WebStart link and ensure
that a valid JNLP f=
ile is retrieved for each simulated
link click.  What I'd really like to do=
 is to actually load
each app, get past the login screen and verify each
ap=
p's main frame is bought up without any database exceptions etc.

Can anyon=
e advise on how best to accomplish this?

Thanks,
Sean
